channel.title: CVE Feed for Advance Search -- Advance Search
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advance Search -- Advance Search

item.title: CVE-2021-38348|2024-09-17T03:06:59.119Z -- advance%20search -- advance%20search
item.description: The Advance Search WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the wpas_id parameter found in the ~/inc/admin/views/html-advance-search-admin-options.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.1.2.
